title: How to get out of Silver ?
body:
I am a Vayne main. I'm desperately trying to get out of silver, but somehow my team always feeds. Some of you may say that I should carry more, but I mean that doesn't work. I Almost try to carry all games, but never succeed. I try to aim for cs and kills, try not to die most of the time, but nothing helps.
Can you give me an advice ?

replies.body: Its silver, play vayne top and stomp the enemy top laner, splitpush and carry from there, low elo in a nutshell is watching them all group mid for some reason while you're off tearing up towers, and you're vayne, get a rageblade and you'll have that stacked on a tower when they get there, pop R Q and kill whoever showed up, chances are 1 to 2 people only is what they'll send, you'll kill them, get the tower then bail, and repeat top/bot

If you win games you get LP which if you have a 100 LP in your Division you get into a Series which you need 2 out of 3 wins to get to the next rank, unless its to change from Silver to Gold which you need 3/5 wins to move up. If you do this you will be out of Silver

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U1NJ7NhR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-02-04T16:28:20.750+0000)
>
> If you win games you get LP which if you have a 100 LP in your Division you get into a Series which you need 2 out of 3 wins to get to the next rank, unless its to change from Silver to Gold which you need 3/5 wins to move up. If you do this you will be out of Silver

Read the text, not the title

> [{quoted}](name=DeaMaster1905,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U1NJ7NhR,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-02-04T16:41:46.644+0000)
>
> Read the text, not the title

I know I did it on purpose. If you want to really break out of silver it's easier than you think. 
1 Main 1 champion have like 2 backups
2 OTP this champion
3 because of your focus on 1 champion you will start to gain game knowledge and know when to do certain things
4???
5 Get promoted to Gold 4+

Usually is going to be Game knowledge that holds you back. When I first placed in season 3 I placed Bronze 4. This season I placed Plat 4. That is a huge Difference and I am a Ekko OTP.
Don't flame your team. Find a *good* Support to duo with.

> [{quoted}](name=Done25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U1NJ7NhR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-04T15:52:58.471+0000)
>
> Don't flame your team. Find a *good* Support to dou with.

I try not to, but sometimes it gets out of hand. I always mute all chat and I also have a duo support

> [{quoted}](name=DeaMaster1905,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U1NJ7NhR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-04T16:01:11.001+0000)
>
> I try not to, but sometimes it gets out of hand. I always mute all chat and I also have a duo support

Who do they play and at what win rate?

> [{quoted}](name=letsfeedtogether,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=U1NJ7NhR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-04T15:20:01.759+0000)
>
> dont play adc right now,

Why shouldn't I ?
they're really weak right now. so harder to get out of silver, as an adc main with 73% winrate,
maybe switch to {{champion:236}} or {{champion:21}} and aim to stomp the shit out of your lane opponent

Vayne is one of the best champs to hard carry in low elo. If you can’t win games it’s most likely your own fault. Remember: not feeding does not equal carrying. 

Try split pushing. People have no idea how to deal with it.
